doc.field: RG 6.6. Office of Sustainability/Office of the Assistant Vice President for Sustainability
RG 6.6. Office of Sustainability/Office of the Assistant Vice President for Sustainability
New York University Archives Collection of Publications and Ephemera
New York University Archives Collection of Publications and Ephemera

The NYU Sustainablog highlights the initiatives and participants of NYU Office of Sustainability programs. Topics on the blog include climate change, compost, recycling, veganism and vegetarianism, urban agriculture, food waste, bicycling, water conservation, news about sustainable initiatives around NYU, and tips to be more sustainable. The website wasredesigned in 2019. The blog dates back to 2015.
